name: cromagnonlegend/phpmake_serialport
description: Serial port PHP extension (Gorilla) - A PHP extension for communicating with serial-port devices (e.g. Arduino, AVR, PIC) on POSIX systems and Windows

post-install-cmd: @php -r "echo '\n\033[33m⚠ IMPORTANT: This package requires a compiled C extension.\033[0m\n';"
@php -r "echo '\033[33mOr see README.md for manual installation instructions.\033[0m\n\n';"
post-update-cmd: @php -r "echo '\n\033[33m⚠ Extension may need recompilation after update.\033[0m\n';"
check-extension: @php -r "if (!extension_loaded('Gorilla')) { echo '\033[31m✗ Gorilla extension is NOT loaded\033[0m\n'; exit(1); } echo '\033[32m✓ Gorilla extension is loaded\033[0m\n';"

suggest.ext-Gorilla: Required for serial port communication. Run 'composer run install-extension' to compile and install.
